name: Software House Simulator
description:
EAT, SLEEP, RELEASE A GAME, REPEAT.

With this game you can finally become a Business Man and manage the Software House of your dreams
Release games, consoles, gamepads, etc... and try the thrill of becoming a billionaire!

With this game you can grind money as you prefer, you can release games, create controllers or consoles, virtual reality glasses, hire new employees to help you with the online store and much more!
